Value.Value: RSS Description (used in the RSS feed)
The full path to the AddThis javascript include. Create your own account / profile on www.addthis.com
Der vollständige Pfad um AddThis Javascript einzubinden. Erstellen Sie Ihr eigenes Konto/Profil auf www.addthis.com
Create a Google optimized chain of words in your URL. Usually you use the title and other keywords. The words are separated with - and are written in lowercase.
Erstelle eine Google optimierte Kette von Wörtern in deiner URL. Normalerweise verwendet man den Titel und weitere Keywords. Die Wörter werden mit - getrennt und klein geschrieben.
This is the date on which the post is published. The post will not be displayed before this date. The date usually also influences the sorting.
Dies ist das Datum an welchem der Beitrag veröffentlich wird. Der Beitrag wird nicht angezeigt vor diesem Datum. Das Datum beeinflusst meistens auch die Sortierung.
This is the main picture shown in the list and in the details. Blog-Post images should be 2x wider than tall, since that's the common share-format. We recommend 2000x1000 pixels.
This is the main image for this article.
Die ist das Hauptbild für diesen Beitrag.
This is the main content of the blog post.
Use first ca. 100 characters of body for teaser
A category of the post must be selected in each case. Since category names rarely change, new categories can only be added by the site administrator.
Eine Kategorie des Beitrags muss jeweils ausgewählt werden. Da die Kategorienamen selten ändern, können neue Kategorien nur vom Seitenverwalter eingefügt werden.
Tags help to better classify the blog post and link different posts together.
Tags helfen den Blogbeitrag besser einzuordnen und verbindet verschiedene Beiträge miteinander.
Optional content - if nothing is specified, title and teaser are used automatically
Optionale Inhalte - wenn nichts angegeben ist, werden automatisch Titel und Teaser verwendet.

The following information is required when the post is shared. If you want to know more, you can find more information here: Open Graph. If these fields are empty, other fields (e.g. teaser) will be used automatically.

Die folgenden Informationen werden benötigt wenn der Beitrag geteilt wird. Wenn du mehr wissen will, gibt es hier mehr Informationen dazu: Open Graph. Wenn diese Felder leer sind, werden andere Felder (z.b. Teaser) automatisch übernommen.
Max. 140 characters because Twitter would use this description.
Max. 140 Zeichen weil Twitter diese Beschreibung verwenden würde.
The visible name as show on links.
Schlüssel der in Links verwendet wird
Description for Page Listing all Posts with this Tag
Beschreibung für Seite, welche alle Blogs dieses Tags anzeigt
Show a pager - usually you don't want this on pages which show just a news extract, but you really want this on the main blog page.
Normalerweise ist dies auf Seiten, welche nur einen Auszug von News-Einträgen anzeigen, nicht gewünscht, jedoch auf der Hauptliste der News unerlässlich.
Use this function to weight a tag higher, e.g. to display it larger in a tag cloud. 1 is less important than 10.
Nutze diese Funktion um einen Tag höher zu gewichten z.b. um ihn in einer Tag Cloud grösser anzuzeigen. 1 ist weniger wichtig als 10.
Super-Adaptable Blog for DNN and Oqtane
Ein einfacher aber sehr anpassungsfähiger Blog für DNN
Warning: The App has no details page configured, which will cause problems on live web sites. Change the details page using these instructions
Warnung: In der App ist ein Demo-Detail-Seite konfiguriert, welche auf Live-Websites Probleme verursachen wird. Ändern Sie die Detailseite mit diesen Anweisungen
The requested post was not found.
Der angeforderte Artikel wurde nicht gefunden.
All posts must be assigned to at least one category
Alle Beiträge müssen mindestens einer Kategorie zugeordnet sein
The next one with larger date
DSGVO – Welche Pflichten auf die Unternehmen zukommen
Warum die EU-DSGVO auch Schweizer Unternehmen betrifft
Alles rund um Websites, Shops, Weblösungen etc.
Home Showing List of Latest Top 3 Posts

Daniel Mettler grew up in the jungles of Indonesia and is founder and CEO of 2sic internet solutions in Switzerland and Liechtenstein, an 20-head web specialist with over 800 DNN projects since 1999. He is also chief architect of 2sxc (see forge), an open source module for creating attractive content and DNN Apps.

Daniel Mettler wuchs im Dschungel von Indonesien auf und ist Gründer und CEO von 2sic internet solutions in der Schweiz und Liechtenstein, einem 20-köpfigem Web-Spezialisten Team mit über 800 DNN-Projekten seit 1999. Er ist auch Chefarchitekt von 2sxc (siehe forge), einem Open-Source-Modul zur Erstellung attraktiver Inhalte und DNN-Apps.

Blog v5.0 released! Hybrid so it runs on Dnn and Oqtane! We recreated everything from scratch using the latest best-practices from 2sxc 12. Enjoy and modify to your 💖's content!

oh btw - it also uses Formulas extensively 🧪

Getting Started with Blog

Read about the blog release, features and more in our blog 😎.

Take a look at these azing checklists, if you need help.

This Demo-Post Shows...

This post has everything configured that is possible:

  • Title of the post
  • Automated url key for google optimization
  • Date from which the post is to be shown
  • The content of the post (this text)
  • Teaser, which will be shown in list and detail view
  • The main image of the post
  • Image Hotspot to make sure the most important area of the main image is always visible
  • Categories and tags to keep the posts organized
  • The author of the post
  • Show on start page which takes effect if you implement the Home top posts view
  • Meta title and Meta description for SEO
  • Sharing description which is used when the post is shared
Blog 5.0 - Custom Title for Meta Releasing Blog 12
Blog v5.0 released! Hybrid so it runs on Dnn and Oqtane! We recreated everything from scratch using the latest best-practices from 2sxc 12. Enjoy and modify to your 💖's content!

Take a look at these azing checklists, if you need help.

You can filter the posts by 3 different criterias:

  • Category
    • Click on the link in the sidebar or the post header
  • Author
    • Click on the link in the post footer or the author image in the post header
  • Tag
    • Click on the link at the end of the post content
Post to demonstrate the filter functionality of the app.

This is a test for the optional teaser. If the teaser is empty then it should use the first 100 characters from the context text.

The new Blog 6.0 uses the latest features of 2sxc 16, including

  1. responsive WYSIWYG content
  2. zen edit experience
  3. optimized toolbars
  4. Razor code using the new TypedEntities

Responsive WYSIWYG Content

Bloggers love to add images to their posts, but this creates a big challenge for perfect websites.

Multiple Resolutions

Images should be served in multiple resolutions depending on the size they are shown in. So every image should automatically be converted to a picture-tag with all the possible resolutions.

Multiple Formats

Some browsers understand modern image formats such as WEBP, while others don't. Perfection is to provide all possible formats and letting the browser pick what's best. 

Screen-Optimized Layout

Images should auto-rearrange themselves to be beside the text on desktop, and above the text on mobile.

Sections

A blogger needs to create sections with texts beside images, and the next section should be below the previous - otherwise the images have strange staggering effects. The section above this one has space beside the image, but this text should not be beside it, because it's a separate section. 

Section splitters can also have additional height (which again varies by screen size) for perfect layouts.

Image Lists

A common need is also to show multiple images - which again should re-arrange themselves as the screen changes. We've added optimized CSS to make sure that 3 left-aligned images 33% will correctly pad themselves:

Zen Edit Experience

Blogs tend to have a lot of fields, such as tags, publishing dates, author and much more. But as you're texting, you will usually just want the main post, and nothing else. 

We've made this possible thanks to the new feature in 2sxc 16, where a button can open the Edit UI for just one field. So this is what editing the current post looks like ➡️.

Optimized Toolbars

Every dialog / list now has toolbars optimized to each specific use case. The most special is certainly the new field-edit toolbar used for the new Zen-mode. ➡️

Try it Yourself

All this is possible thanks to new features in 2sxc 16. Just for demonstration, we've added some images to lighten things up. Resize your screen to see how the images in this post re-arrange themelves as expected. 

Have fun!

With 💖 from Switzerland,
iJungleboy
